meanings.sent1: The fireworks created a starlike pattern in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The costume had starlike sequins sewn onto it.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with starlike sprinkles, making it look magical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so bright and starlike, it lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The crystal chandelier cast a starlike glow across the room.

meanings.sent1: The starlike lanterns illuminated the garden path.
meanings.sent2: The starlike diamond on her finger sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The starlike disco ball reflected light in all directions, creating a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were starlike, full of wonder and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The starlike headlights of the car pierced through the darkness of the night.
